H0.text: What is added to white wine to make a Kir. Blackberry syrup

H1.text: What is added to white wine to make a Kir. Peach puree

H2.text: What is added to white wine to make a Kir. Grand Marnier

H3.text: What is added to white wine to make a Kir. Cassis

A4.text: Kir is a French cocktail made with a measure of crème de cassis (blackcurrant liqueur) topped up with white wine.

A5.text: Replacing the crème de cassis with blackcurrant syrup is discouraged.
